name: Krishna - The Butter Thief
description:
Inspired by the childhood pastime of Lord Krishna in Vrindavan. Play as Krishna as he tries to steal pots of butter from the homes of the gopis. Can you sneak in and out unnoticed?

Features:
· 40 challenging levels.
· 16 Achievements to unlock.
· Play your flute to make the gopi girls fall asleep.
· Find the hidden lost calf on every level.
